text:
@TomFitton @Getaclue77 The #N95 masks filter down to .3 microns.

The #COVID19 #Virus is .05 to .02 microns.

I know for some math is hard so this may help them.

.05 - .02 is smaller the .3

The N95 offers hardly any protection against the virus. But I guess wearing one makes people 'Feel' safe.
